data.title: How to join files with mediacoder?
data.text:
It would be better if the join was performed on the fly during encoding.

The source is mjpeg (avi) or mpeg and for those containers I have some tool

but to first trim, then join 2-4 Gb of data is really annoying.

Post by rich

Post by 4N

Hi,

I couldn't find a tutorial to join files during encoding in mediacoder.

Using avisynth won't do, the audio looses sync with video, then I tougth

selecting task=join would suffice but the encoding process stopped after the

first file was encoded.

Does someone know if there's a way to make it someway?

P.S.

The output is h264 with aac audio inside a .mp4 container

Join before encoding? - Whats the input file format?

--

rich

maybe it's broken just in 3990...

I'll try to revert back to some older versions

I have build 3980, but I think this is in all recent builds. At the

right side just below the file name/properties windows is "Task Mode;"

open that dialog and select "Join." It's nearly always worked for me.

And I transcode mostly into H.264.
